tool.name: Single cell data exporter
tool.command: mkdir /ftp/wueflo00/$dataset_name && cp $shiny_clustering_file /ftp/wueflo00/$dataset_name && cp $shiny_gene_names /ftp/wueflo00/$dataset_name && cp $shiny_user_clustering /ftp/wueflo00/$dataset_name && cp $shiny_clustering_sparse /ftp/wueflo00/$dataset_name && ls /ftp/wueflo00/$dataset_name

param.name: shiny_clustering_sparse
param.label: Full expression data in sparseMatrix format

param.name: dataset_name
param.label: How do you want to label your dataset?
param.help: Give a unique and representative name to your dataset which will be seen in the shiny app.

tool.help: Simple tool to copy datasets to a Rshiny readable directory. This tool is meant to be used as part of the Single Cell pipeline and it is of no use on its own.
